channel.title: Burning Game CD (BF 2142)
channel.description: Is there any way to copy my Battlefield 2142 CD and give it to somebody? He lost his CD somehow, and he told me that he would give me an Eclipse II for it. I tried Alchohol 120 but cant seem to find the right way (if its even possible).

item.title: Burning Game CD (BF 2142)
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

exps35:

Is there any way to copy my Battlefield 2142 CD and give it to somebody? He lost his CD somehow, and he told me that he would give me an Eclipse II for it. I tried Alchohol 120 but cant seem to find the right way (if its even possible).

Download an ISO Extracter(Search google), extract the ISO and burn the ISO with Alchol 120. Should work.

Read full topic
